Forties.text:
Wind
In northeast, northerly or northwesterly 4 to 6. In southwest, northwesterly 4 to 6 becoming variable 2 to 4, then northerly or northeasterly 5 to 7 later.
Sea state
In northeast, rough or very rough. in southwest, moderate or rough.
Weather
In northeast, squally sleet or snow showers. In southwest, rain or showers, wintry later.
Visibility
In northeast, moderate or good, occasionally very poor. In southwest, good, occasionally poor.
